items.preText: 7.44pm The players are back on, the Afghan huddle has dispersed and Liton Das and debutant Nazmul Hossain are stretching near the field. Aftab Alam will start with the ball, with a slip in place. We're almost set... 7.40pm Slow surface in Abu Dhabi, those inexperienced yet intimidating Afghan spinners, a strong total of over 250, no Tamim and Mushfiqur. We know who's on top at the halfway stage. Bangladesh will need a really strong and collective batting display to get themselves to 256 tonight.
items.text: lots of drama on the first ball, it's gone down the leg side for a wide and through the keeper and Shahzad did not come back to the stumps to collect the throw from fine leg. There was a bit of mix up between the batsmen, and had the keeper been in place, Hossain would have gone back without facing a ball!
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 2 wides

items.text: lovely bowling, making the ball swing from leg stump to well outside the off stump. Nazmul pokes and is almost squared up
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: slightly wider outside off and swinging away, he lets it go this time
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: nicely stroked off the back foot with the ball swinging away outside off, he steers it square and Rashid dives to his right at cover point to stop it
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: drags the length shorter this time, Nazmul wants to cut and misses
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.preText: The second slip moves to leg side now
items.text: on the pads, tucked away square from Nazmul for two quick runs and he's off the mark in ODIs
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 2 runs

items.text: shapes it away a bit from middle and off, the batsman stays back and defends towards point
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: drifts this one with the seam on the pads, flicked away to leg for one. Liton off the mark first ball
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Round the wicket to left-handed Nazmul with a slip
items.text: plenty of room on the off side, it's picked up and he stretches out to drive it in the gap for three
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 3 runs

items.text: pitched up on middle and leg, worked straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, no run

items.text: slightly full on the stumps again, nudged to the leg side again
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, no run

items.text: turning in this time from around off, he helps it along to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: this one turns into Nazmul from outside off, he defends it carefully
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: gets some width outside off and he pokes his bat out to steer the ball wide of third man for two
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: much shorter, Liton goes back on his toes and swats it to the leg side and Rashid dives at midwicket to save a few. Brings out a smile while he's on the ground
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

items.text: short of length, it rises and nips in towards the end and Liton scythes it to third man
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: angles it across from middle stump, Nazmul hangs back to defend it to the leg side
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: too full, swinging away and Nazmul drives that nicely in the gap wide of cover. It's racing away bt Rashid puts in a chase and slides to keep it to two. You can't keep this man out of the game
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 2 runs

items.preText: Some towel treatment for the ball. Is it the dew or just sweat?
items.text: some late swing again outside off, Nazmul defends it late towards point
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: brings it in towards leg, Liton works it to square leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Long on and deep square leg are outside the circle
items.text: bit more flight for that googly, and Liton works it to leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: tries to defend it to leg and gets a thick edge back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: leading edge and that's a lolly for point! Nazmul gave Mujeeb the charge and went for a big shot on the leg side but the ball straightened after pitching on length outside off, took a thick outside edge and ballooned towards point
items.postText: Akki: "Rashid is exceptional but we should also praise Mujeeb he bowls in power plays and no dares to step out" And those who step out often lose their wicket
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, OUT

dismissal.text: Najmul Hossain Shanto c Aftab Alam b Mujeeb Ur Rahman 7 (13b 0x4 0x6) SR: 53.84

items.text: gets a loose delivery first up, wide and short outside off, and he throws his hands at it to get a thick edge towards third man
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: slightly slower on the stumps and he pushes it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
